articles.title: Beware the birds: Bird flu confirmed in Boston
articles.description:
Health officials say the risk to the public remains low after infected birds were confirmed in the Emerald Necklace.

The post Beware the birds: Bird flu confirmed in Boston appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bird flu confirmed in Boston's Emerald Necklace area, raising health concerns.
Health officials report low risk to the public despite the confirmed cases.
Residents advised to avoid contact with wild birds to prevent potential spread.

articles.title: Read President Trump’s statement on Iran in full
articles.description:
"Now is the time to seize control of your destiny, and to unleash the prosperous and glorious future that is close within your reach."

The post Read President Trump’s statement on Iran in full appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: President Trump urges Iranians to seize control of their future in recent statement.
Statement emphasizes prosperity and a glorious future for Iran, affecting local Iranian communities.
Potential shifts in U.S.-Iran relations may impact Boston's diplomatic and economic landscape.
